title: how cooked am i?
content: so i borrowed two books at the beginning of my first semester and totally forgot about returning them, now im 3 weeks into my second sem. How much do i owe the library in overdue fees and is there any loophole?ðŸ˜­

comments.body: u might have to pay some fine, that shud be it. Go return it soon
how much would the fine be if the books are 5 months overdue?
I am not sure, rules have changed now. Check with librarian
1 Rs is fine for the initial days, and then it increases to 5 Rs, I guess
Return it. Don't know the exact rules for this type of thing
i didnt return a book for the entire first semester (i forgot to) and they charged me almost 200
